Reviews.Title: “Superb for the price; the complaints below are confusing.”
Reviews.Author: Heltravel
Reviews.Content: im traveling relatively pricey hotels booked october visit afraid id terrible decision especially seeing awful earlier reviews pleasantly surprised price paid overall quality makes wonder actually huge disparity quality depending ramada plaza stay maybe kept stayed floor building putting farther street quieter nights sleep hallway smelled perfectly fine spots crap fine furniture barebones perfectly fine pretty clean cleaning crew left cleaning rag day bed comfy towels bit rough absorbed water properly iron clothes look supercheap hotel expecting stars youre gonna disappointed dont recommend youre planning spend lot waking time hotel price provides quality thats actually id expect front desk staff courteous thorough ps dont id recommend staying hotel circle dont car ramada doesnt offer airport shuttle service management months ago shut im extra cash improve facilities pretty note san diego hotel cost 1525 taxi call front desk cab itll arrive 15 mins cool
